mapper.select: SELECT h.BO_NO boNO, h.TC_ID tcId, h.CLASS_CODE classCode, h.HM_TITLE hmTitle, h.DEADLINE deadLine, h.HM_CONTENT hmContent, h.CREAT_DATE createDate, h.SUBJECT subject, f.ORIGIN_NAME originName, f.CHANGE_NAME changeName FROM HOMEWORK h LEFT JOIN HOMEWORK_FILE f ON h.BO_NO = f.BO_NO WHERE h.TC_ID = #{tcId} ORDER BY h.BO_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOMEWORK (BO_NO, TC_ID, CLASS_CODE, HM_TITLE, DEADLINE, HM_CONTENT, CREAT_DATE, SUBJECT) VALUES (SEQ_HOMEWORK_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{tcId}, #{classCode}, #{hmTitle}, #{deadLine}, #{hmContent}, SYSDATE, #{subject})
mapper.select: SELECT BO_NO FROM ( SELECT BO_NO FROM HOMEWORK WHERE TC_ID = #{tcId} ORDER BY BO_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOMEWORK_FILE (BO_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME) VALUES (#{boNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HOMEWORK_FILE WHERE BO_NO = #{boNo} AND CHANGE_NAME = #{changeName}
